name: MISP IOC Submission
description: Malware Information and Sharing Platform (MISP) threat intelligence platform IOC Submission

options.name: MISP URL
options.description: URL of your MISP instance to include the schema (i.e., https://) and port if applicable

options.name: Authentication Key
options.description: You MISP authentication key. If you have access to an authentication key, you can find it under "Event Actions" -> "Automation" in the MISP web interface.

options.name: Allow IOC Deletion
options.description: If checked, users will be able to delete attributes from MISP.

options.name: Ignored Entities
options.description: A Comma Separated List of Domains and IPs you wish the integration to ignore and not look up.

options.name: Ignored Domain Regex
options.description: Any searched Domains that match this Regex will be ignored and not look up.

options.name: Ignored IP Regex
options.description: Any searched IP Address that match this Regex will be ignored and not look up.
